description:
Be a Twitter Hero and get 3 XP for following Crypto-Gin and for liking and retweeting following tweet: https://twitter.com/Crypto_Gin21/status/1626937945654542336

IMPORTANT: Send us your Twitter profile name in the text box while participating for this badge, so we can check whether you fulfilled all tasks
name: Twitter Hero (Follow, Like, Retweet)
